data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: For some reason, we are not allowed to email these documents to our colleagues in Dallas. We ____ mail ____ paper ____. So ____ need ____ prepare ____ today, and ____ them ____ the ____ of ____ day. They must be in Texas by the beginning of next week.
data.partBlankContent: For some reason, we are not allowed to email these documents to our colleagues in Dallas. We mu__ mail th__ paper cop___. So y__ need t_ prepare th___ today, and ma__ them b_ the e__ of t__ day. They must be in Texas by the beginning of next week.
data.fullContent: For some reason, we are not allowed to email these documents to our colleagues in Dallas. We must mail them paper copies. So you need to prepare these today, and mail them by the end of the day. They must be in Texas by the beginning of next week.
data.answer: 由于某些原因，我们不能将这些文件通过电子邮件发送给我们在达拉斯的同事。我们必须给他们寄纸质的。所以你需要今天准备好这些，在今天结束之前寄出。他们必须在下周初到达德克萨斯。
